subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|虫|朱|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=insect}}. Originally a {{liushu|p}} of a spider. Later, '{{zh-m|朱}}' was added to the pictograph to indicate sound. In [[small seal script]], the character became written as the characters {{zh-m|鼄}} and {{zh-m|*蛛}}.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|棚蜘蛛|水蜘蛛|海蜘蛛|草蜘蛛|蛛煤|蛛絲|蛛絲馬跡|蛛網|蛛網塵封|蛛蛛|蜘蛛|蜘蛛抱蛋|蜘蛛綱}}
